meanings.definition: People who watch movies in a theater.
meanings.sent1: The filmgoers enjoyed the action-packed movie at the cinema.
meanings.sent2: Many filmgoers gathered at the theater to watch the latest blockbuster.
meanings.sent3: The filmgoers chuckled at the comedy film playing on the big screen.
meanings.sent4: The filmgoers were like bees drawn to the colorful flowers of the cinema.
meanings.sent5: The filmgoers' excitement was palpable as they entered the movie house.

meanings.sent1: Filmgoers eagerly awaited the start of the movie screening.
meanings.sent2: The filmgoers lined up outside the theater for the special screening event.
meanings.sent3: As the filmgoers entered the screening room, they felt like VIPs.
meanings.sent4: The filmgoers were the stars of the show at the exclusive screening.
meanings.sent5: The filmgoers' anticipation grew as the lights dimmed for the screening.

meanings.sent1: The filmgoers applauded enthusiastically at the end of the movie.
meanings.sent2: During the film, the filmgoers were completely engrossed in the story.
meanings.sent3: The filmgoers whispered excitedly to each other during the movie.
meanings.sent4: The filmgoers' laughter filled the cinema during the comedy film.
meanings.sent5: The filmgoers' reactions added to the immersive experience of the cinema.
